tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Jayashree is very well experienced and she came as a saviour as my doc was out of station at the time of my unexpected labour. She was very confident and also gave me the right push and motivation at the time of my delivery. Post delivery, she made sure that Im keeping well and if my overall health is all good. I cannot thank her enough for arriving so early in the morning at the right time and also who did a fabulous job. I will be forever grateful.
